article.description: — Shannon Grant had 18 points and Neftali Alvarez posted 16 points as Mercer routed Milligan 88-49 on Saturday.
article.headline: Grant carries Mercer over Milligan 88-49
article.story: MACON, Ga. -- — Shannon Grant had 18 points and Neftali Alvarez posted 16 points as Mercer routed Milligan 88-49 on Saturday. Grant shot 9 for 10 from the floor. Jalen Johnson had 11 points for Mercer (3-4). Felipe Haase added eight rebounds. Jackson Gabriel had 17 points for the Buffaloes. ------ For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/hub/college-basketball and http://twitter.com/AP--Top25 ------ This was generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap, using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
